column4: When I try sudo apt-get upgrade, I get "E: Could not get lock /var/cache/apt/archives/lock - open (11 Resource temporari ly unavailable) E: Unable to lock the download directory"

OS or Window Manger (Gnome, KDE, etc)? You can do either, or both
